record.name: SLO Response Edit (4c)

init.expressions.init.expressions: if (created.from.wiz in $L.file=true and index("logical.name", str(condition in $L.file))>0) then ($stop=false;$begin=index("logical.name", str(condition in $L.file))+25;$lng=lng(str(condition in $L.file))+1;for $i = $begin to $lng do (if ($stop=false and substr(str(condition in $L.file), $i, 1)="\"") then ($stop=true;$end=$i));$slo.logical.name=substr(str(condition in $L.file), $begin, $end - $begin))

if (created.from.wiz in $L.file=true and index("company", str(condition in $L.file))>0) then ($stop=false;$begin=index("company", str(condition in $L.file))+20;$lng=lng(str(condition in $L.file))+1;for $i = $begin to $lng do (if ($stop=false and substr(str(condition in $L.file), $i, 1)="\"") then ($stop=true;$end=$i));$slo.company=substr(str(condition in $L.file), $begin, $end - $begin))

if (created.from.wiz in $L.file=true and index("request.dept", str(condition in $L.file))>0) then ($stop=false;$begin=index("request.dept", str(condition in $L.file))+25;$lng=lng(str(condition in $L.file))+1;for $i = $begin to $lng do (if ($stop=false and substr(str(condition in $L.file), $i, 1)="\"") then ($stop=true;$end=$i));$slo.request.dept=substr(str(condition in $L.file), $begin, $end - $begin))

if (created.from.wiz in $L.file=true and index("location", str(condition in $L.file))>0) then ($stop=false;$begin=index("location", str(condition in $L.file))+21;$lng=lng(str(condition in $L.file))+1;for $i = $begin to $lng do (if ($stop=false and substr(str(condition in $L.file), $i, 1)="\"") then ($stop=true;$end=$i));$slo.location=substr(str(condition in $L.file), $begin, $end - $begin))

if (created.from.wiz in $L.file=true and index("priority.code", str(condition in $L.file))>0) then ($stop=false;$begin=index("priority.code", str(condition in $L.file))+26;$lng=lng(str(condition in $L.file))+1;for $i = $begin to $lng do (if ($stop=false and substr(str(condition in $L.file), $i, 1)="\"") then ($stop=true;$end=$i));$slo.priority=substr(str(condition in $L.file), $begin, $end - $begin))

if (created.from.wiz in $L.file=true and index("category", str(condition in $L.file))>0) then ($stop=false;$begin=index("category", str(condition in $L.file))+21;$lng=lng(str(condition in $L.file))+1;for $i = $begin to $lng do (if ($stop=false and substr(str(condition in $L.file), $i, 1)="\"") then ($stop=true;$end=$i));$slo.category=substr(str(condition in $L.file), $begin, $end - $begin))

if (created.from.wiz in $L.file=true and index("risk.assessment", str(condition in $L.file))>0) then ($stop=false;$begin=index("risk.assessment", str(condition in $L.file))+28;$lng=lng(str(condition in $L.file))+1;for $i = $begin to $lng do (if ($stop=false and substr(str(condition in $L.file), $i, 1)="\"") then ($stop=true;$end=$i));$slo.risk.assessment=substr(str(condition in $L.file), $begin, $end - $begin))

record.title: scmsg(8,"slo")
record.window.title: scmsg(14,"slo")

comments.comments: This wizard is used to walk a user through editing an existing Response SLO (Service Level Objective) or adding a copy of an existing SLO (cloning).

record.brief.description: Edit Response SLO (Change Request Condition Filters)
